content: By default, all artifacts generated are in JSON format (found in fsh-generated folder). Can I generate XML files ? The reason is XML files are what Forge supports, and there are some who want to use Forge to see the profiles.
No need, I just found that Forge supports reading JSON. Sorry
Cool. The other approach is to run IG Publisher after SUSHI -- which will create XML files. It will also run the snapshot generator so the profiles are more "complete".

Thanks, @Chris Moesel . I see these are XML are generated in the output folder:
CapabilityStatement, StructureDefinitions (profiles) and ValueSets:

  1. definitions.xml.zip
  2. examples.xml.zip

btw, both StructureDefinitions in 1. and 2. are identical (+ no of files). Is there something wrong in my case ?

I think you can find the XML profiles in a few spots: directly in output, in output/package.tgz, and in output/definitions.xml.zip. To be honest, I've never looked in examples.xml.zip, so I don't know what it should have. Others in this stream might know though.
